overview: The war has made Yemen one of the greatest humanitarian disasters on earth. The warring parties fly to Sweden to start negotiations. After deliberations to reach a solution, this results in the "Stockholm Agreement" in December 2018. A large media contingent covers the press conference at the peace negotiations, including the journalist Manal Alwesabi. She is from Hodeidah in southern Yemen, a port city at the center of the fighting. But the chaos in Yemen just continues.
title: The Stockholm Agreement
